content.query:
USE demo
GO

-- Select data using OPENROWSET (from Synapse autogenerated script)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net/demo/nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_delta/',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]


-- Create external table for easy use. Data source and formats must be created the first time (from Synapse autogenerated script)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://demo@datakickstartadls.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'yellow_trips_delta')
	DROP EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_delta;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_delta (
	[vendorID] nvarchar(4000),
	[tpepPickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[tpepDropoffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[startLon] float,
	[startLat] float,
	[endLon] float,
	[endLat] float,
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[paymentType] nvarchar(4000),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] nvarchar(4000),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[pickupDt] date,
	[dropoffDt] date,
	[tipPct] float,
	[Borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupZone] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupServiceZone] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_delta/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.yellow_trips_delta
GO


IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE name = 'yellow_trips_parquet')
	DROP EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_parquet;
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE yellow_trips_parquet (
	[vendorID] nvarchar(4000),
	[tpepPickupDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[tpepDropoffDateTime] datetime2(7),
	[passengerCount] int,
	[tripDistance] float,
	[puLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[doLocationId] nvarchar(4000),
	[startLon] float,
	[startLat] float,
	[endLon] float,
	[endLat] float,
	[rateCodeId] int,
	[storeAndFwdFlag] nvarchar(4000),
	[paymentType] nvarchar(4000),
	[fareAmount] float,
	[extra] float,
	[mtaTax] float,
	[improvementSurcharge] nvarchar(4000),
	[tipAmount] float,
	[tollsAmount] float,
	[totalAmount] float,
	[pickupDt] date,
	[dropoffDt] date,
	[tipPct] float,
	[Borough] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupZone] nvarchar(4000),
	[PickupServiceZone] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'nyctaxi/tripdata/yellow_parquet/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [demo_datakickstartadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.yellow_trips_parquet
GO
